The.Jungle.Book.2016.1080p.TC.X264.Masteredition.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: 1080p Chinese Telecine 
Audio: English Line Stereo 2.0 (cpg/exclusive)
thx


Notes:
This is a special Encode which took me another 2 days of work, but the result is excellent, its a masterpiece from this source.
I have encoded it in 1080p only cause this movie needs quality. looks and sounds perfect a real cinemafeeling.
Quality is tested and optimized to look perfect even on a 75" 4K TV.


Encode:
Last Masteredition for now guys, was fun,the tag and the idea to maximize the enjoyment, hope you liked them

The Chinese telecine needed a lot of work,it was way too overbright but colours were ok on this

Since daylight scenes were too bright i lowered them to normal levels, but that would have killed the darker scenes,
so i had no other choice than to split the movie into scenes again and treat every one as needed.
it was a pita, but totally worth it. nothing is cut from the movie btw.


Line Audio was nice, cpl spots needed resync to get all lipsync.

got very nice and will do me till retail
enjoy

PS: maybe Xmen is next, we will find out soon!
